mapper.select: select o.orders_no,o.goodsDetail_no as mainno,cnt,gs.name || '-' ||g.name name,g.goods_no,filePath || '/' || imgPath imgpath from orders o inner join ( select orderTotal_no from order_total where orderTotal_no = #{orderTotal_no} ) s1 on o.orderTotal_no = s1.orderTotal_no inner join goods_Detail gd on o.goodsDetail_no = gd.goodsDetail_no inner join goods g on gd.goods_no = g.goods_no inner join goods_Size gs on gd.goodsSize_no = gs.goodsSize_no
